page.title: 04Yacht Club
page.content: The main objects of the club is to promote the sport of Sand Yachting, this incudes training and licensing the pilots.The club is a founder member of the British Federation of Sand and Land Yacht Clubs. There are 12 different classes of membership for Juniors(14-18 yrs), Cadets(18-21 yrs),individuals,families,social,group (up to 6 persons),weekly and day memberships. The idea of sand yachting could of come from the Egyptians,they used to use sail assisted chariots.In China they sailed wheelbarrows.Land yachting evolved in Belgium at the turn of this century,and the first competitive event took place in 1909.
